jd: Hi All, Need Local candidates only and looking for 9+ years genuine candidate with Java and Digital Payment Background is Must with SRE and ETL. Leverage connection pooling and thread pooling concepts effectively.Scalability and Performance: Design and implement low-latency, high-throughput systems. Understand service mesh within Kubernetes, differentiate between API gateways and service meshes, and create Grafana dashboards for monitoring.Networking Protocols: Apply a solid understanding of transport protocols like TCP/IP and differentiate between TCP and UDP to optimize network performance.
